embeds.title: A Message From The Founder
embeds.description:
Hey, I'm **<@1143672889757925438>** ‚Äî welcome to the lab.

I built this space for people who are serious about turning ideas into reality. Whether you're just getting started or you've been building for years, this is a place to experiment, connect, and ship.

No fluff. No gatekeeping. Just builders helping builders.

If you've got questions, ideas, or just want to say what's up ‚Äî I'm around. Drop into the chats, join a voice session, and make this place your own.

Let's build something that matters.

embeds.title: Welcome to Quad's Lab
embeds.description:
**Ideas mutate into systems. What survives gets shipped.**

This is a community for builders, founders, and experimenters who are serious about turning ideas into reality. Whether you're launching your first product, scaling a business, or exploring new systems ‚Äî you're in the right place.

embeds.title: Server Rules
embeds.description:
Before you dive in, take a moment to read our community guidelines in <#1457461136638345401>.

**The short version:**
‚Ä¢ Be respectful and constructive
‚Ä¢ No spam, self-promo without value, or drama
‚Ä¢ Help others when you can
‚Ä¢ Keep it professional

We're all here to build ‚Äî let's keep it that way.

embeds.title: Getting Started
embeds.description: Ready to dive in? Here's how to make the most of Quad's Lab:

fields.name: 1. Grab Your Roles
fields.value: Visit <#1457461529392971849> and select the tags that match your interests and business focus

fields.name: 2. Introduce Yourself
fields.value: Drop into <#1457460632843583624> and let us know what you're working on

fields.name: 3. Share Your Work
fields.value: Building something? Post it in <#1457462630535921766> for feedback and support

fields.name: 4. Join Voice Chats
fields.value: Hop into <#1457460632843583625> or <#1457463069822156951> to connect with other builders in real-time

footer.text: Welcome to the lab. Now get building.

embeds.title: Channel Guide
embeds.description: Here's what each area of the server is for:

fields.name: Read Only
fields.value:
<#1457461136638345401> - Community guidelines
<#1457461304305520888> - Important updates
<#1457461233258201394> - Welcome new members
<#1457461529392971849> - Pick your interest roles

fields.name: Chat Lab
fields.value:
<#1457460632843583624> - Main hangout spot
<#1457462630535921766> - Share what you're building
<#1457462735661961507> - Bounce ideas off others
<#1457611185305288725> - Discuss tools & tech

fields.name: Public Labs
fields.value:
<#1457460632843583625> - Casual voice chat
<#1457463069822156951> - Open voice sessions
<#1460308775658586223> - Live content creation

fields.name: Community Labs
fields.value: Personal voice channels for members to host their own sessions and collaborate

embeds.title: Community Labs
embeds.description: Want your own space to hang out, collaborate, or host sessions?

fields.name: How It Works
fields.value:
1. Join <#1460016666472874110>
2. A personal voice channel is automatically created for you
3. You become the host with control over your lab
4. Invite others to join and collaborate

fields.name: Your Lab, Your Rules
fields.value: As the host, you can manage who's in your lab and what happens there. It's your space to experiment, brainstorm, or just chill with others.

fields.name: Temporary by Design
fields.value: Community labs are created on-demand and clean up automatically when everyone leaves. No clutter, just action.

embeds.title: Shape The Lab
embeds.description:
This community is built by its members. Got an idea to make the server better? We want to hear it.

Head to <#1458550489162715308> to share your suggestions ‚Äî whether it's a new channel, a feature request, an event idea, or anything else that could improve the experience here.

fields.name: How It Works
fields.value:
1. Post your idea in <#1458550489162715308>
2. The community can discuss and upvote
3. Good ideas get implemented

fields.name: What We're Looking For
fields.value:
‚Ä¢ New channel suggestions
‚Ä¢ Bot feature requests
‚Ä¢ Event or activity ideas
‚Ä¢ Ways to improve the community
‚Ä¢ Anything that helps builders build

footer.text: Your idea could shape how this place runs.

embeds.title: Bot Features
embeds.description: The lab comes equipped with some tools to make things more interesting:

fields.name: Points System
fields.value: Earn points by chatting, spending time in voice, and being active. Use `/points` to check your balance.

fields.name: Leaderboards
fields.value: See who's most active with `/leaderboard`. Track messages, voice time, and points.

fields.name: Gambling
fields.value: Feeling lucky? Use `/gamble` to play slots, blackjack, coinflip, and roulette with your points.

fields.name: Polls
fields.value: Create polls to get community input with `/poll`.

embeds.title: Progression Roles
embeds.description:
Track your journey as a builder! Head to <#1457461529392971849> to pick the level that best represents where you're at.

**You can only hold one progression role at a time.** As you grow and level up, come back and upgrade your role whenever you're ready.
